wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General Sir Henry George Wakelyn Smith, 1st Baronet,  (28 June 1787 – 12 October 1860) was a notable English soldier and military commander in the British Army of the early 19th century. A veteran of the Napoleonic Wars, he is also particularly remembered for his role in the Battle of Aliwal (India) in 1846, and as the husband of Lady Smith.

response: * Sir Harry Smith, 1st Baronet (1787–1860), British soldier
* Sir Harry Smith, 1st Baronet – Officer of the 95th at Badajoz and Waterloo.
